data.name: Premium Investment Package
data.description: The full-featured investment loan packed with positives for future generations.

bundles.name: Premium Package Home Loan Package
bundles.additionalInfo: Premium Package Home loans include an annual fee waiver for the platinum credit card, everyday banking, no establishment fee for personal loans, and up to a 10% discount on insurance for eligible customers.

features.additionalInfo: You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App or Internet Banking.
A Mortgage Offset account reduces the amount of interest you pay on your home loan. The amount within this account is offset against your home loan, meaning you only pay interest on the difference.
Flexible Repayments: Make your loan repayments weekly, fortnightly or monthly
Construction Loan Offset: We protect an equivalent amount of land on the Bank Australia Conservation Reserve as is being constructed to help offset the environmental impact of land clearing
If you're ahead of your repayments, you may be able to redraw fee free, with restrictions if your loan is fixed

eligibility.additionalInfo: Non-individual borrowers: Includes Non-trading Companies and/or Family/Unit/Hybrid Trusts
Individuals (natural persons) must have the legal capacity to enter into the loan contract, provide acceptable identification documentation and be 18 years or older.
Individuals only: Not available for non-personal borrowers.
Applications for loans are subject to the Bank's lending criteria.
Australian citizen or permanent resident of Australia

fees.name: Mortgage Discharge Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request Bank Australia to arrange for the registration of discharge or Bank Australia is required to attend settlement. It covers preparation of the discharge of mortgage form. Statutory government registration fees will still apply. Additional fees may apply and should be paid direct to our agent if settlement is requested in a location other than a Bank Australia office.

fees.name: Valuation Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If you request a loan variation, Bank Australia may need to revalue your property before approving the request.

fees.name: Portability Fee- New Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you request that a property securing a loan is replaced with a property that is a new security to Bank Australia.

fees.name: Portability Fee- Existing Mortgage
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when a property securing a loan is replaced with a property that is already registered with a Bank Australia mortgage.

fees.name: Loan Package Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Annual fee payable on all Premium loans. The fee is debited to the loan annually on the anniversary date of funding and is non refundable. Only one annual package fee applies per customer where multiple package loans exist

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Investment Loan with Principal and Interest repayment type. For home loans with new lending at 'Loan to Valuation Ratio' of <60%
Investment Loan with Principal and Interest repayment type. For home loans with new lending at 'Loan to Valuation Ratio' of <70%
Investment Loan with Principal and Interest repayment type. For home loans with new lending at 'Loan to Valuation Ratio' of <80%
